levels.description: ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>, heals <@ba.vup>1</> additional target, and the targets of Xingzhu's talent recover HP equal to <@ba.vup>{attack@xingzh_s_2[heal].atk_to_hp_recovery_ratio:0%}</> of Xingzhu's ATK per second
